title: People Holding Hands Light Skin Tone Medium Light Skin Tone
description: Two people holding hands, representing connection, partnership, ropersonce, or friendship between individuals with light and medium-light skin tones.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the people holding hands emoji, depicted with light skin tone and medium-light skin tone, is a warm and inclusive symbol of togetherness. Apple's design language imbues the hands with a soft, tactile feel, enhanced by glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients that suggest gentle connection. This emoji is ideal for representing friendship, companionship, or shared journeys, underscoring unity and support through its beautifully rendered form on Apple devices.
